title: Sinner returns from doping ban at Italian Open
description: Jannik Sinner is returning from a doping ban at the Italian Open.

title: 'I have some gas left in the tank': At 37, Djokovic still has big tennis goals
description: Djokovic has had a rough start to 2025, but shown flashes of brilliance too. And he's aiming for that 100th tour win.
author: Simon Cambers

title: Draper rues missed chances in Rome loss to Alcaraz
description: British number one Jack Draper is knocked out of the Italian Open as Carlos Alcaraz shows his quality under pressure to reach the semi-finals.

title: Sinner meets newly elected Pope at Vatican
description: World number one Jannik Sinner meets with newly elected Pope Leo XIV in Rome.

title: Unlock the Perfect Slice Serve - Essential Tennis Podcast #415
description: The wide slice serve is a CRITICAL tool to have in your tool box. It pulls opponents out of position, opens the court up for you to hit into, exposes their usually weaker backhand side, and forces them to run twice as far for the next shot - if they even get it at all. Let’s take a deep dive into how YOU can develop this powerful weapon, step by step in this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: 3 Djokovic Secrets To Winning More Matches - Essential Tennis Podcast #414
description: In this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast, you're going to learn the top 3 tactical secrets of Novak Djokovic that you can apply in your very next match. Use these tools to gain precision, consistency, and offense to make your opponents more uncomfortable, win more points, and win more matches.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: What is the Rome tennis schedule?
description: Two quarter-finals at the Internazionali BNL d’Italia will take place on Thursday in Rome. Jannik Sinner takes a 3-0 Lexus ATP Head2Head lead into his clash with Casper Ruud on Campo Centrale not before 7 p.m. CEST/1 p.m. EDT. Tommy Paul and Hubert Hurkacz kickstart the day's action. View Thursday's full order of play below. ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 15 MAY 2025 Campo Centrale - start 13:00 ATP - [30] Hubert Hurkacz (POL) vs [11] Tommy Paul (USA) Not Before 15:00 WTA - [6] Jasmine Paolini (ITA) vs Peyton Stearns (USA) Not Before 19:00 ATP - [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs [6] Casper Ruud (NOR) Not Before 20:30 WTA - [8] Qinwen Zheng (CHN) vs [4] Coco Gauff (USA) SuperTennis Arena - start 13:00 WTA - Ulrikke Eikeri (NOR) / Eri Hozumi (JPN) vs Storm Hunter (AUS) / Ellen Perez (AUS) WTA - [8] Asia Muhammad (USA) / Demi Schuurs (NED) vs Veronika Kudermetova / Elise Mertens (BEL) ATP - [4] Marcel Granollers (ESP) / Horacio Zeballos (ARG) vs Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs [7] Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: What were the Rome tennis results?
description: Two of the Internazionali BNL d'Italia quarter-finals took place Wednesday, when Carlos Alcaraz beat Jack Draper and Lorenzo Musetti ousted Alexander Zverev. View all the Rome tennis results from Wednesday below. Results - Wednesday, 14 May 2025 Men's Singles - Round of 16 ATP - [6] Casper Ruud (NOR) d Jaume Munar (ESP) 63 64 Men's Singles - Quarter-finals ATP - [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d [5] Jack Draper (GBR) 64 64 ATP - [8] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d [2] Alexander Zverev (GER) 76(1) 64 Men's Doubles - Round of 16 ATP - Sadio Doumbia (FRA)/Fabien Reboul (FRA) d [WC] Federico Bondioli (ITA)/Carlo Alberto Caniato (ITA) 63 62 ATP - [7] Christian Harrison (USA)/Evan King (USA) d Andre Goransson (SWE)/Sem Verbeek (NED) 63 62 ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA)/Mate Pavic (CRO) d Sander Gille (BEL)/Jan Zielinski (POL) 75 46 10-2 ATP - [Alt] Guido Andreozzi (ARG)/Theo Arribage (FRA) d Matteo Arnaldi (ITA)/Alexei Popyrin (AUS) 46 64 10-8 Women's Singles WTA - [4] Coco Gauff (USA) d [7] Mirra Andreeva 64 76(7) WTA - [8] Qinwen Zheng (CHN) d [1] Aryna Sabalenka 64 63 Women's Doubles WTA - [3] Sara Errani (ITA)/Jasmine Paolini (ITA) d Alexandra Eala (PHI)/Coco Gauff (USA) 75 36 10-7 WTA - [6] Mirra Andreeva/Diana Shnaider d [1] Gabriela Dabrowski (CAN)/Erin Routliffe (NZL) 62 46 11-9 [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: Italian Open 2025 Day 8 Quarter Final Recap
description: On day eight at the Foro Italico, the bottom half of the draw played their quarter-final matches with Carlos Alcaraz seeing off Jack Draper, and Lorenzo Musetti taking out defending champion Alexander Zverev. Both matches had similarities but different outcomes. Alcaraz wobbled but pulled through with a strong finish, whereas Zverev wobbled and never recovered, …
author: Jonathan

title: Italian Open 2025 Day 7 Recap
description: On day 7 of the Internazionali BNL d’Italia in Rome, all sixteen men were scheduled to be in action in their fourth-round clashes at the Foro Italico. However, only seven of the eight matches were completed. Earlier rain delays forced the postponement of Casper Ruud’s round-of-16 clash with Jaume Munar to Wednesday, as the match …
author: Jonathan
